@erinrileyau but then disabled women breeding us still seen as unacceptable & that's a whole nother story.
@erinrileyau many disabled women are told not to have kids or prevented from doing so & are desperate about it
@erinrileyau it must be ghastly & presupposes that no kids is just "selfish".
